nodes.text: Koruu was a furred space pirate of an unidentified species and a member of Lemo and Sanda's gang of pirates.

Koruu attempted to kill Lando Calrissian at a cantina on Arcan IV when his loyalty to Lemo got the best of him, but for his actions received a knife to the chest from Lando and was killed instantly. At the time Calrissian was disguised as Captain Drebble.
Koruu was created by Mary Jo Duffy, Ron Frenz and Tom Palmer.
